content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were watching tv when around 5:27 he went out to the balcony of my apartment for a smoke.  i live up on a hill on the border of golden and lakewood that overlooks denver and its suburbs to the north.  he knocked on the window for me to come and look at something.  i am a mufon investigator so i watch the skies often.  he pointed out a bright greenish light in the sky to the nne.  it was just sitting there perfectly still.  i thought it looked very strange so i grabbed my binoculars.  he then pointed out that there were actually 4 objects.  all of them were still.  that looked even more interesting so i grabbed my video camera.  once i got out there with the camera they began moving.  when i got my camera on them there were three left.  the forth had moved off to the east.  when i began video taping one object began to move off to the east, and one to the west.  the one to the west then came back moving to the east.  then while filming the remaining light, which was perfectly still, just its right and above it another light lit up.  form reviewing the video, it looks like it was there blinking dimly, then got much brighter and stopped blinking.  soon after, the bottom light lit up very brightly.  when it got very bright, it appeared like an angled disk shape.  it then began to move to the east like the rest and dim out.  all of them did this when they flew easy and as they got dimmer they also began to blink.  the remaining light did the same thing.  it began to get extremely bright, and then it began moving east.   here again it would get dimmer and begin to blink.  this can all be seen on the tape.  as it moved to the east, i noticed yet another light appear the same place the last one had appeared.  this one was dimmer and began move to the east blinking immediately.  when the tress got in the way i stopped filming.  however, we could see at least two of the light off in the distance over denver.  then after a few minutes they began to fade too dim to see.

at this point i called the director of investigations to let him know what we saw.  that call was made at about 5:55. while on the call at about 6:15, my friend could see another light appearing in the same spot they had appeared before.  i got off the phone and went back with the camera, however right when i got the camera on it, it faded very dim.  my friend saw another one of them over denver that was lighting up very bright again.  again once i got the camera on it, it faded out.  because i thought they might be reacting to the camera i put it away.  a couple minutes later another light appeared where the others had.  this time, this one stayed still.  it looked like it actually was two light side by side.  as it sat there another light began to light just below it to the left.  the light appearing looked very disk shaped through the binoculars.  after 30 seconds or so as it finally seemed to be finished appearing or whatever it was doing and they both moved to the east.  one headed east over denver, the other seemed to keep a regular distance from us and moved in an arc to the east with us in the middle.  once it got due south of us, it just seemed to hover out there.  we then noticed one out over denver.  this one seemed to be east of downtown and it had two lights, one at either end.  it moved south and appeared very large for as far away it was.  i would say about half the size of a dime at arms length.  the light towards the front was brighter, and eventually the light at the back began to pulse.  it eventually dimmed out.  we could see one of the light heading east still, but after a couple minutes it began to get too dim also.  at this point the light to the south was no longer visible either.

in total we saw nine of these objects and got seven on tape.  you can look for yourself, but it does not appear that these objects had the characteristics of any known craft.  the closest would be a helicopter, but that would not explain why some appeared to come out of no where, and why they seemed solid at first.  it also would not explain the apparent disk shape.  two other things i would like to note, although they seem extraordinary is that they seemed to react to being video taped, and they seemed to intentionally blink to mimic airplanes.  watch the video and see for yourself.  although this is a compressed version of the video i have posted.  i do have the original and i will show it at the next colorado mufon meeting.
content.summary: 9 seperate bright lights that dimmed and began blinking and moving to the east over denver.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside at a party, laying on the lawn looking at the sky. i was just looking at the blue sky when i saw a silver round object. i thought it was a jet, but it had no contrail and was not moving. i looked at it some more and it started moving away and it disappeared and appeared several times. i went in to tell some of my friends but i couldn't locate it again. i have never seen a ufo before and i was kind of frightened because it was so out of the norm of what i experience everyday. i also felt that it had known that i was watching it somehow but i don't know how, i just felt it. i would say it was 5,000 feet above me due to that it was level to the tip of the ruby mtn range.
content.summary: Daytime object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: i was working with my partner when he informed me of this black metallic round object hovering in the sky.At first,it seemed to me that it was an apache helicopter with gunners on its sides, but the strange thing about the object; it had no sound nor any type of lighting.This object hovered above the holiday inn hotel on ocean drive.My partner and i made it a point to call the naval air station in corpus christi,texas the next day to see if they registered anything on their radar that day,but we never did call them.We just decided not to tell anyone of this incident for fear of being made fun of.
content.summary: Saw a metallic round object that at first i thought was apache helicopter w/gunners on sides but this had no sound nor lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my driveway watching a meteor shower,and i was watching one going left when it suddenly did to hairpin turns down then left,then it sailed across the sky brightly
and largely when it curved downward and it appeared to hit the ground and explode quietly and yet it appeared to be close to my house,then me and my family all of them saw it and got creeped out and i went back in,because i got the strange feeling the pilots of said ufo were going to come to our house,even though they didnt
content.summary: Green object flys hit's ground and appears to explode quietly

content.detailedDescription: I never noticed the object at the time - it wasn't until i got my film developed that i saw it on the picture!  i had filed a report some years ago of a sighting in glenn, michigan, which i had also taken a photo of without realizing it. the object in this picture looks the same as the object in the photo i took in michigan.
content.summary: Orb over the lake

content.detailedDescription:
1. i'm an amateur astronomer. i was in my roll-off-roof observatory in az, taking long time exposures of the pleaides, and m-31, andromeda galaxy, with a 35mm camera, "piggy back" on my 12 in meade reflector.  using the large telescope with electronic drive for long period "guiding"
2.  i had just finished an exposure of m-31 and was getting ready to re-photograph the pleiades for a longer exposure.  i had just clicked the cable release and looked at the pleadies when this bright light appeared, almost in the pleaides.
3.  never saw anything like it.  thought it was a flare of some sort.
4.  it just appeared, very bright, like the full moon.  it just hung there and dissappeared as fast as in appeared.  about 3 seconds.  there was no movement, no sound, no smoke.
5.  i was very excited that i may have captured it in the frame i was just taking, as the shutter was "open" for my next exposure.  i immediately closed the shutter.  i process my own negatives and went inside to my makeshift darkroom and developed the negatives.  i do not have my enlarger set up in arizon as yet.  i just examined the neg. with a 15x lupe. i did capture the "object". i did not want to take it to a photo lab so i had to wait until i returned home to medina and i scanned the 35mm neg. with  my hp 35mm scanner for photos.  i contaced and e-mailed the print to cassandra klesch, a member of a local ufo group here in ohio.  she suggested i contact mufon and send a print to get your comments.
6.  the "light" or "object" just disappeared.  no movement, and did not fade gradually, it just went out.
content.summary: Bright light, umbrella shaped.  appeared quickly, no motion, dissappeared quickly

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving along us-33 westbound towards columbus, ohio when i saw a long and bright streak of light stream downwards towards the horizon. i have seen many of shooting stars (meteorites) but this was not one. for one, it was broad daylight out. also, it was low to the horizon almost, unlike meteor showers that are characteristically overheard. i was also very slow, unlike the fast streaking of a meteor. the color was a very bright amber color. it didn't look like a craft of any sort but i could tell that it had a "ball" or solid object at the head of it with a long tail streaming behind it. i couldn't help but notice it it was slow low to the horizon and bright. i even started looking at the drivers going past me to see if anyone was staring upwards towards the same area of sky. no one was...

also, after driving a bit after it happened, i pulled over at a meijers gas station (near coonpath road) to see if i could spot it again. after about 2-3 minutes i seen a very similar light slowly ascend upwards in the same general location, moving much slower. the duration of the second sighting was about 15 seconds as opposed the the first sighting of about 10 seconds.

i was completely amazed by this sighting. i have never seen anything like it in my life. i have been a paranormal researcher since 1997 and have fielded my share of ufo reports but have never dreamed of actually seeing one. my field of specialty is hauntings and you can find me at paraex.Org. please contact me if you saw this event or have any questions regarding it!
content.summary: Large amber colored light streak that looked like a fireball in broad daylight.

content.detailedDescription: My mother called me outside to see object in the night sky.I saw what to me was an orange color object about the size of a star moving very fast accross the night sky from southeast to southwest and thhe speed was tremendous zip i knew it was not a plane way to fast for that.I noticed no trail of flame or sound and the object reversed direction southwest to southeast then the object came from east moving slower but still at a great speed going west and it started to wobble and go lower in the west and i lost sight of the object.My reaction was i think i just saw a ufo.The next day there was a story in the paper of something landing in an apple orchard in eastern pennsyvania and i never heard or read anything more on the event. i beleive what ever i saw was no plane or rocket. i can still remember the wobbling of the object after all these years.
content.summary: Orangecolorsize of a starmoving veryfastsoutheasttosouthwestthenbacktoeastthenwestandwobbling

content.detailedDescription:
You may not believe my story, but it is entirely true.  i wish for my real name and true location to remain anonymous because of the seriousness of my sighting.  for many years i never mentioned it to hardly anyone.  trust me, i have now seen ufo's before, and i know that they are real.  my own story begins back when i was a young kid (around 14 years old-1969), and growing up in a small town named scottsville, kentucky.  my grandparents and i witnessed something extremely unusual and bizarre on one particular dark night.  that strange dark night changed my life forever, and i truly became a believer in what i thought was impossible.  we were sitting outside on my grandparent's front porch talking and such when i decided to go out into the yard and look around.  my grandfather was inside the house at the time.  my grandmother was outside with me sitting on the porch.  the sky was very dark that night, and no stars were visable anywhere.  after i had walked out into the front yard for a short distance, i just happened to look up into the night sky.  i was totally shocked to say the least at what i saw!  it was absolutely incredible.  hovering directly over my grandparent's house was this very large glowing football shaped disk.  the disk appeared to be about half the size of a football field-very large.  it was just hovering there silently with several colors of glowing lights all around it, and not making any sound at all.  it couldn't have been more than 20 feet above their house, and was over the tree tops not burning anything.  i yelled for my grandmother to come quick and see this "thing" for herself.  she came and was somewhat stunned too.  then we yelled for my grandfather to come outside and see this thing for himself.  he did so, and we all just stared in awe at what we were witnessing for close to ten minutes.  we even wondered if some being would come out of the saucer!  then, suddenly the object just simply disappeared as it took off so very swiftly-in the blink of an eye.  our local news covered the sightings of several of these mysterious disks that night observed all over scottsville and allen county.  a school friend of mine later on even informed me that his family saw five of them hovering over their farm pasture on that same night, and one of them actually landed for a short period of time.  the air force told us that what we had all seen was a meteorite.  funny thing is, i have never heard of a meteorite hovering over an area silently for over ten minutes, and then vanishing-and perfectly shaped like a large disk.  i am convinced that the craft that we saw that night was under some kind of intelligent control-alien control.  i think they may have even been trying to contact us in some way.  anyway, you have my story and it is the truth-every word of it.  i am a christian, and have no reason to lie about something like this because i know that it is important.  we are not alone!  to my surprise i found this out several years ago on that strange dark night way back in 1969 as a teenage boy.

thank you-jonas grumby



blc
kvs
content.summary: Glowing disk shaped saucer-flaming different colored lights all over

content.detailedDescription: Approx 11 yrs old visiting family in pr. after supper sitting on porch. saw object approach in sky, landed in front of me,(approx. 100 ft) yelled out to sister for camera several times without taking my eyes away from object.   turn my head into house and demanded camera/  sister came running w/camera and object was gone.. no sound..  vivid image.  retired law enforcement from nyc now 45 yrs of age.  no kidding. can describe in detail.. object not in in sky/ just "parked across the street'first notice object approaching in sky/no clue as to what it was/not  a saucer /long and oval with windows bright yellow in the mid section/calm reaction/frustrated when no one believed/ok now
content.summary: Sitting on porch object landed approx 100ft i/f visual 45 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
We were on a water skiing trip at lake buena vista near bakersfield in june of 1990. although there were many people on this trip, it was only myself, my husband (at the time) and a good male friend of ours, still awake around the fire. we were discussing ufos, etc. and although none of us had ever had a sighting, i had mentioned a book that i had read that said one could request a "fly by". only seconds after my comment, my then husband pointed to the horizon. we, of course thought he was joking until we saw it too. just above the horizon hung a little ball of colorful light. in a blink of an eye, literally, it was right in front of us, just around 150 feet up and probably 400 feet across,triangular (somewhat elongated) and inky black except for the lights, and absolutely silent. 
the lights were at the three corners and at one point were "chasing" like christmas lights (lighting one at a time in consecutive order).
we made a few comments to each other like" i cant believe my eyes" and "oh my god.."it then turned on its axis so we saw its profile. it was long and slim from the side. we could still see the lights, but of course instead of chasing in a triangle they were just going up and down (make sense?)
after about a minute and a half of this, it left at a 90 degree angle from which it came. again, it only took a second to get back to the horizon, but let me state, that we could see it go. it wasn't as if it disappeared then reappeared far away. the rest is important too, i think. we were of course speechless. i went to bed first, felt no fear, as a matter of fact, i felt extremely peaceful, and slept well.
we didnt speak of it the next day, or for another six months or so. i would think of it pretty often, but had no desire to talk about it. then one night it came out and the flood gates opened and the three of us remembered the same details. its my opinion that they "heard" a telepathic request, then gave a post hypnotic suggestion. 
thanks!
dawn von flue
december, 2005
ps. i am an artist by trade, and would be happy to do a sketch or painting if it would help!
www.Vonflueart.Com
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very large, black, silent triangle sighting, very close. seemed to show up on demand.

content.detailedDescription:
At a friends house hanging out.  rex the owner of the house said that he and other people had seen a ufo,  we went out side and looked and it was there.  he said it never appears in the same spot.  the light kept increasing and decreasing in intensity and changed colors.  it also would get reallly high and move from left to right.
a street lamp, but then started to move, and we had never seen a light in this spot before.  at first we just began to dismis it as a star, but i was so close that that would be impossible.  while three of us were watching it we began to say how it was making us feel uncomfertable.  as soon as we said that a bright ball of light shot over the hill below the original light.  this was very loud.  we saw three more of these lights  throughout the night.  we never fully lost sight of the object until we got in a car and started to drive tword it.  this was not the first experiance with these lights and im sure it will not be the last.  if any one is interested in researching this email me at gizmogreen57@hotmail.Com
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A very close ball of light changed colors and shifted positions, less then a half mile away at all times.  stange lights(not shooting stars) shot across the sky several times while watching the original.  you could hear them pass

content.detailedDescription: It has been 40 years, but i have never forgotten what i saw on december 9, 1965. i was residing at a youth facility known as new jersey boystown. it was dinner time, and we lined up along side a chainlink fence to make the walk to the mess hall. the sky was clear and would soon become evening. as i remember there was a full moon to the left, and as i waited i just gazed at the moon. there appeared to be a speck come from the left side of the moon (seemed to come from behind the moon). that caught my attenntion right away, as the speck grew bigger and closer. in a matter of seconds it was a huge as a house right in front of me! now it took 40 years for me to think of this, but the object seemed as though it was moving at a speed far slower than i imagined...That is to say it seemed like it was 'flying' rather than tumbling to the earth. the object looked like a huge fireball, but more like an ember or like a piece of charcoal with darker shades of red where it was perhaps cooler. there was indeed lots of fire and a trail of smoke. the object moved from my left to right and it seemed 'guided' to me (again, not like it was tumbling to earth) i was 16 at the time and not told too many about it except my family. after the incident we talked about it in the mess hall, but most thought it was a meteor. i have a differing opinion these days. it took 40 years for me to make my own conclusion...Kecksburg rings loud in my ear these days...What else could it have been?? oh, and there was no sound coming from the object other than a hissing, but it was not loud. sometimes the smallest details elude you for a long time...But considering the moon is 186,000 miles away and the object was in front of me within seconds...How is that possible? if it were a meteor wouldn't it take longer to go that distance? well, there you have it...Something i have thought about for the last 40 years.
content.summary: A huge fireball

content.detailedDescription:
Before reading this story it's important to note that the sky over woodland was perfectly clear on the night in this report, it was so clear i could easily make out several constellations, like orion in the night sky, from street level. 

on the night of december 10th, 2005, at approximatly 10:34pm i was bringing in groceries from my car parked in front of my house. upon closing the car door with the last load of groceries in hand, i noticed three bright orange lights moving south accross the woodland sky. they did not have blinking lights like a typical aircraft, and their movement was very steady. i first noticed them because of their color, they matched the color of a streetlight, only smaller and farther away. they moved without formation at first, one leading the way, with another following slightly behind and farther below. the third followed from a much farther distance and was catching up to the first two lights. i watched in awe, i never thought i would see something like this, especially not in woodland. i followed them accross the sky as they moved now south west. the first two began to slow allowing the last light to catch up, it proceeded below the other two at approximatly the same vertical distance to the second light, as the second was to the first, but slightly ahead of the second light. they came to a complete and slow stop, and stayed in that formation for about 40 seconds. the lights were now evenly spaced, to each other and at a slight diagonal angle, angling south. then the 3rd light, the lowest one in the sky proceeded to move further south, but by very little, then stopped once more. i noticed accross the street one of our local teenager population walking down the block and called to him and pointed into the sky, he looked and asked what the fuck is that, to which i replyed, i don't know. he kept walking

it was at this time that i had the sense to try and capture a photo on my cell phone. unfortunatly, the street lights, and overall low quality of my phone cam, yielded a picture with a fuzzy and completely black sky, no lights. so i immediatly called my father, my first call met with the typical "i'm sorry the number you've dialed is no longer in service," so i hungup and tried again. this time i got him and told him to run outside now, because i was watching 3 ufo's in the night sky. 
 
while i was on the phone and watching the second light moved back north, making the light formation into a triangle in the sky. i was even more interested now, these were no aircraft, and no way in heck these were stars, sattelights, or otherwise, they had made a geometrical formation in the sky! 

then something even more amazing happened. my eyes began tracking what looked like a slow moving man-made made its way across the sky, it had blinking lights that were very dim. it was heading north and slowly headed towards the center of the triangular shape formed by these lights. it passed through the middle of this triangle and about 1 second later, the second light, the northmost edge of the triangle shut off, it didn't zoom, blinkout, or flahs, it simply, shut off. it was followed about 3 seconds later by the third and most southern light. the 1st and most verticle light lingered for another 5 seconds before shutting off as well, leaving me with a black sky, no minimal or dim lighting replacing the locations of these lights, as if there would be if they were spotlights of some sort turning off. 

i don't know what these lights were. i don't think they were man-made because man made civilian or military aircraft operate with minimal hull lighting and with blinking lights on the wings and tailfins, this includes helicopters, this minimal hull lighting gives the appearance of very dim flashing lights slowly travelling accross the sky i saw no such blinking lights, and the orange lights were simply too bright to've been coming from the hull of such a craft. the color of these lights was suspect as well, they were the same rosy orange hue as a typical street lamp, but much farther away. while these lights were not blinding or illuminating to the ground or sky, they were easily bright enough for my peripheral vision to pickup when i first noticed them, which is pretty bright. i am not making a statement as to what they were with this, only a statement as to what i think they were not. if mufon or its members could find out what plane this may've been that i saw travel between these lights, or if anyone on that flight reported these odd lights, or if there were any helicopters travelling in a group of three with lights that match my description in the sky that night, it would go a long way towards easing my mind.
content.summary: 3 orange continuous lights seen in south west woodland, ca sky

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to take out the trash, and my neighbors were all in the front yard looking at the east/southeastern sky. there was what appeared to be a giant star that flashed various colors, and after staying still for a bit, would sway a little side by side. i called my boyfriend and children out to see it, and my daughter said she saw it the night before, and it had 7 smaller lights around it. my neighbors said they had also seen it for several mornings this week, in a different part of the sky. they pointed to above and over back of our house, which would put it towards the north.
i did not have a good camera to get a picture with, just a little kodak 3 megapixel with a little zoom. but i'll send you the photos- one untouched, perhaps you can apply some effect to it to make it stand out better, and some with autolevels,(using phototshop) to give some idea of the brightness. the pictures i send, though, in no way do this justice. for one thing, the multiple colors do not show up.  we looked at it with a little telescope we had using a 60mm lens. i wish i had a camera to go with my telescope.I personally expected to see a satelite, and was very surprised to see what looked like a glowing sphere.We saw a perfectly round ball, the outside of which was circled in a purple light. the "nucleus" of the ball was changing colors constantly, and the whole ball had a glow to it. i, my neighbor, my youngest son and his friend all were able to see this. it was one of the most beautiful things i have ever seen. off to the right of it, we could see something that looked light the light from the ufo was reflecting or shining on it, but we couldn't make it out enough to tell what it might be. 
the ufo, or whatever it is, is currently traveling very, very slowly, dipping down towards the south. 
we will not have phone service for about a week, so in the meantime please contact me via email.

before i give any identifying info about my neighbors, i'd like to check with them first. they've gone to bed. however, i, my boyfriend, and all 3 of my children saw it; i, my youngest child, his friewd from next door and his friends mom, were able to see it with the 60mm lens and see that it was a sphere of some sort.
content.summary: In the east/south east, looks like giant star, flashing, changing colors.Sweeping sideways a little, then standing still.

content.detailedDescription: I was over at a friends helping to finish some odds and ends on a deck we had just rebuilt a few days before when i decieded to play around with his camcorder and set it up on a tripod , pointed it up at an aprox. 65degree angle just looking past the edge of his roof some 20+ feet up and zoomed out to 40x and let her run for an hour adjusting for the sun every now and then. after that time i went into the house and started to download whatever i had on tape into the computer. after about 15 minutes my friend said we had to go so i stoped downloading and we went to do something else. it was a week later before i could spend some more time going over what i had downloaded and in that time my friend had taken his camcorded to a family reunion and had taped over what i had taped.I had started to go through it frame by frame because whatever i had taped was moving to fast to see well. thats when i saw the two objects for the first time and my heart jumped. the objects were traveling in a east to west direction at a very high rate of speed. what ever the other objects were they to are traveling in pairs.You have to view the video frame by frame to realy see whats passing by.
content.summary: Set up camcorder to film what i thought were rods, turned out to be something else.

content.detailedDescription:
Semi driver.  southbound on i-79 between erie, pa and pittsburg.  forward truck in group of three spaced approx. one half km. appart.
weather was unusual.  sheet lightning, low rolling cloud cover, no precip. of any kind.
cb on.  used to note weather annomily to trucks behind at the 90/79 junction at erie, pa.  content to listen too the rear two trucks for the duration.  up to the event.
event.  completed "rolling off" of a long decline at approx. 65 mph. and started long climb of next hill.
nearing crest of hill the cb explodes in crackling static for several seconds the goes dead.
fm radio band likewise.  
alt. light comes on and dash lights go nearly out.
off to my left (east) at approx. a thirty to fourty degree angle an object drops below the cloud cover.
service ceiling was about 1,500 ft.
it is luminous, triangular with cannard tips on the wings.  these bent in downward attitude.
it appears to be discharging electricity down the "wing" edges in blue and soft yellow.  also "sputtering" or "arcing off" showers of sparks from ?? the wing closest my position.
i lost the object in my mirror bracket but watched the reflection of it on the hood surfaceas it crossed i 79.
(recent instalation of a visor over the wind screen made direct veiw non practical.)
duration of event thus far 07 seconds est.
there was a sizable flash of blue/ white light. and a razor sharp streak of light east to west from my front, slightly right of the rig, to the hills in the west -followed by a massive flash of white light in the area i will assume as south west of acron ohio.
cb and truck electrical immediately returned to normal, as did fm radio.
i was shocked but excited and grabbed the cb mike.
"what the hell was that?  did you boys see that thing"?
the reply came a sew uncomfortable seconds later:
"hand, some things you ain't supposed to see"
they sped up, overtook my rig and when they were a comfortable distance to my front one asked the other "do you think they were ours"?
reply: "don't matter after that.  i figure its in a million small parts about now"
i told my wife and marked it in my log book as flash, flash, flash.  the nato code word for the imminent detonation of a nuclear device.  that is how bright the flash of light was.
lots more happened on the return trip at 0945 hrs. the following day from just north of pittsburg in the cranberry area to 9 miles south of erie pa>
all rest areas closed for no particular reason.
several empty flatbeds broken down on the southbound side in groups of two at spaced intervals of two or three miles between.
a group of three vehicles, black, two large cars and a full sised van at 79 junction to sharron / clarion.
personel outside of vehicles were, if memory serves,
wearing identical baggy coveralls.
one last thing.  at no time did i note sound of any kind. at no time did i note detectable clues as to engine operation ie. afterburner or jet stream of exhaust.
closest point to object approx. 500 ft.
exact date of occurrance is not fixed as exactly as the visual portion... but i know it was early on a monday morning.  i remember thinking how fortunate it was that the rigs hood had been washed and waxed just the day before.  dumb thing to think of after that .
  for your consideration.
content.summary: Triangle.  slight elongation toward portion forward of aerodynamic surfaces.  glowing slightly.  dischcarging or arcing electricaly.

content.detailedDescription:
Ruben,
i just received a call from a man in fresno about a sighting this morning.  his name is jerry golston.  his phone is 559-439-4120.
 
he delivers papers in the early a.M.  he says he sees all kinds of airplanes and has even witnessed the b-2 twice so he is used to seeing normal things in the sky.  this morning at 4:55 a.M. he observed a light coming from the west.  he said it was like a floating street light and was the orange-yellow color of street lights.  he watched it for what he thought was 2 to 3 seconds and estimated it covered 10 miles in that time.  he said it was round and it appeared to be reflecting the light color.  he knows where the airport is and said the light veered off course to miss the airport.  there was no sound.
 
then at 6:10 a.M. he saw it again.  this time coming from the east.  the description was the same except it appreared to have a headlight like he has seen on helicopters.  it was flying slower than an airplane or helicopter.  this time he could hear a low engine-like sound except it was pulsing or skipping a beat as it went.  it went all the way across the sky.  
 
he was not sure the two incidents were the same but appeared similar.
 
he would like to know if anyone else saw what he did, so i told him someone would call if other reports came in from that area.  
 
this still needs to be entered into the cms.
 
best regards,
john


from ufo evidence web site:

http://www.Ufoevidence.Org/cases/case768.Htm

summary: a delivery person for the fresno bee newspaper saw a glowing, metallic ufo twice during the course of one morning's route. there was a dark spot on the center bottom of the craft. the witness could hear the quiet noise of the engine, which sounded like a low airplane engine, but with pauses in the sound pattern.

  drawing by the witness of the ufo. 

  drawing by the witness of the first sighting.

  drawing by the witness of the second sighting.
 
type of case/report: rawreport 
special features/characteristics: witness sketch
hynek classification: dd 

full report / article

source: ufoevidence.Org 

summary: glowing metallic ufo seen by witness at around 4:50 am. and again at 6:04 am. 

date reported: 12/1/2005 7:32:17 am 

sighting time: 4:55, 6:05 
day/night: dawn 
no. of witnesses: 1 
duration: 3min / 5min 

appearance / description of object(s): 
the object was glowing in a way. but i beleive it was just a metallic object, and the glowing was from the brightness of the engine reflecting off of the vessel. it looked that way because it was high in the sky. i could also see the reflection from the early morning fog, that there was one big head light on the front. this was not a plane. ive lived in fresno all my life and i have seen everything that can fly. and this was not something out of the ordinary. i know what i saw. thats why i am reporting this. this is completly true. its 7:00 am here in fresno. i just got done deleivering the paper. so this just happend. im sober. i deleiver the paper 7 days a week. and ive never seen this before on my route. the wierd thing was. is that i saw it twice. which i think is rare. i could also see that there was a dark spot on the center bottom of the craft. and you could hear the engine very quitly. it sounded like a low airplane engine, but with pauses in the sound pattern. 

size of object(s): 
if you hold out your arm, close one eye, and hold a nickel in your two figers. it would be close to that same size and shape. 

description of area / surroundings: 
suburban area. residential. 

full description & details : 
i was delievering the fresno bee. (the newspaper) i was almost done with the second street at the beging of my route. then all of a sudden i seen this ball of light in the sky behind me. it looked like a moving street light. it was orange. it moved about the pace of a slow helecopter. i had to stop and watch this thing in the sky for about three minutes. then it went out of sight. (about 10 miles in the distance). (second sighting) this time i seen it coming from the east of me on a street called spalding. this time i could focus more on the object. it was moving about the same pace. i watched it for about five minutes. but i seen more of the object this time. it just kept going til i couldnt see it anymore. it was staying about the same altitude. 

can sighting be explained as any conventional man-made or natural object? 
satellites dont have head lights. blimps dont glow. airplanes have blinking lights and are loud. if this was of the military then why was it so bright. i am not crazy. this is what i saw. if you want to know more please contact me. 

witness background: 
i work for fresno bee. and i am going to start college this coming semester. 

views on ufos, before and after sighting: 
i beleive that this whole ufo thing is a little more real than we think. 

reported sighting? no 
name: daren 
location: fresno,california 
age: 22

case id: 768
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Paper delivery young man witnesses low to ground an object 'like a floating street light' twice at 4:55am & again at 6:10am

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on hwy , on a wednesday night (on or about nov 15, 2005) around 7:00 pm.  i was noticing a light in the sky that appeared to be possibly mars or venus, as they are visible this time of year.  as i looked, it seemed to be moving slowly.  i looked up again, a few seconds after i noticed the very bright lights; and i thought it might have been a helicopter.  there are sometimes military operations in the area as there is a military base and weapons dispensary in the area.  it seemed to be moving closer as i was driving.  all of a sudden, it was practically above me.  i looked up and it was definitely something hovering above the area.  i had to look at the road because i was driving obviously.  i looked back up a few seconds later and it seemed to be very high in the sky, higher than it was just seconds earlier, long enough for me to look at the road and look back at the sky.  i looked at the road again and looked back up.  it was to my left, very far away.  a few days later, i saw it again, about 20 miles away from where i saw it the first time.  i was on hwy 11 between steele and ashville, alabama.  it seemed to be a planet once again, but then appeared to be moving towards our direction as we were driving.  this time, we drove directly under it.  it was triangular in shape with very bright lights around the perimeter of the craft.  it disappeared moments later.  i saw it continuously every night for the next couple of weeks.  now i haven't seen it for at least a week.  i think there is the possibility that it could be a military craft.  although i have never seen an airplane or a helicopter that hovered in this way, for such a period of time.  every time i saw it, it was in various locations above the ashville, alabama area.  i cannot explain it and it really creeps me out.  my boyfriend was in the car on at least two occasions.  he couldn't explain it either.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangular object, very bright like a possible planet but hovering with a couple blinking lights on bottom of craft,

content.detailedDescription: On december 5th 2005 in the foot hills of la habra heights ca. (l.A./o.C. county line) at sunset i witnessed an object fly over my home at a decent speed. the object was long, cigar shaped and appeared to be brown or black. almost imeaditly, followed a military chopper. it flew over my home, circled a few times and had its spot light on the house. the object at that time seem to be at the sunset horizon around santa monica and was still visible from my home. the hollicopter followed in pursuit. as i was looking at the object right in front of my eyes the object seemed to grow larger then reduced its size to a small ball of colored light. the whole episode lasted about 15 minutes maybe a little longer. on november 28 in the same area a white ball of light apeared in the south/east night sky and stayed there for a bout 20 seconds and then darted across the night sky. it was a beautiful sight. the week prior over the hills of whittier and la habra heights a bright flash filled the night sky. right after that a bright object apeared,stayed motionless for a monment thenflew toward the san gabriel mountains. about two to three minutes after that there was another bright flash but this time the object apeared over catalena island and then speeded off following the first object. was this the same object that i just saw a few minutes privious? na, i doubt it. may this was some type of "ufo" cat-n-mouse. there is one thing for sure the activity over north orange county since this past summer has been very heavy and i have seen some beautiful and amazing things. and yes there were witnesses to all these events.
content.summary: Miltary chopper following "ufo"

content.detailedDescription: I was on a 34 foot fishing boat in an area called the cabot strait.There was 4 people aboard this boat, 2 were asleep, 1 was steering,and i was laying out on deck which is what i usualy do if it is nice wheather.It was a very clear night and i cant recall seeing a moon,the stars were very bright.We were travelling to the east,then from the south i seen a straight line of yellow lights travelling in a northerly direction.The easiest way for me to describe  it is like this,from my vantage point,the lights looked to be the size of baseballs and they were about a foot apart,there were eight of them. they appeared to be very high  ,i watched them for about 20 secs,then they just disapeared.So i just laying on the deck kind of shocked wondering if i should tell my crewmate who was steering the boat.If i told him ,iknew i would be unmercifully teased and ridiculled for along time,also i was thinking maybe i was seeing things. and then from the south,i seen more lights comming,this time there were 14 lights, same formation as the first,yellow baseballs about afoot apart, i watched these for about 20 secs then they were gone,these were also going from south to north.This may sound silly,but it seemed like they just passed through the top of our atmosphere.I then decided not to tell my crewmates or anyone else.Til now.
content.summary: Baseball string of lights ,each light about a foot apart, 8 lights,then 14 lights

content.detailedDescription: I don't know if this is a ufo report but it was an odd object. i live in a very rural area with my house and land surrounded by forest with no near neighbors. i was working in my back yard on a clear,sunny afternoon and had just straightend up to stretch my back when an object came by me at approx eye level and about 2 feet in front of me. it was about the size of my thumb and moving fast. it left a approx. 1/2 inch dark gray smoke trail for about 4-5 feet behind it that quickly disappated. it was a dark object but moving so fast i couldn't make out any details. it traveled completely horizontal to the ground and zoomed on into the forest.
content.summary: Unknown minature object

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cigarette, scanning the skies and noting air traffic.  i looked due west and spotted a jet that was near what looked to be a small orange dim star.  i thought briefly about it being one of those orange lights that i've seen but figured it was simply a star.  i was about to look away when it appeared to be moving along with the nearby jet (roughly 1/2 an inch away from it in the sky as viewed from the ground).  i thought that perhaps my eyes were playing tricks on me and stood up to get a better view, away from the trees.  the "star" had pulled to roughly an inch away from the jet and was heading directly towards us, travelling due east.  i watched them both approaching for just a second more and called out to my husband.  he came outside and we watched this still dim orange light was being  pursued by a jet.  i told him to go inside and get my camera.  he went inside but couldn't find it (mother in law had moved it by the coffee pot in the kitchen). instead, he grabbed my father in law.  as this was going on, i was watching the orange "star" get closer and closer to us with the jet still pursuing but quickly falling behind.  by the time that my father in law and husband came back out, both aircraft were nearly above us and flying at a relatively low altitude.  the jet was about 5 inches behind the craft and we could hear the rumble of its engines and clearly see a contrail.  the craft that it was chasing was completely silent and had no contrail.  they were low enough that we could make out a dark underbody for the first craft.  all any of us could say was "oh my god" and "oh ****". it had a dim orange colored light towards the front with a second dimmer white light towards the middle.  i could see what appeared to be a whitish light at the rear of the craft.  we could make out a dim outline of the ship itself and it seemed to be narrower towards the front with a much wider back.  it was completely silent as it passed over and its lights were much dimmer than the flashing lights of the jet chasing it.  we watched it as both passed over our roof.  the last time i saw it, it was roughly 8 inches ahead of the jet(viewing from the ground) and then we couldn't see anything but the jet still following the same path.  we were all excited but scared, too.  we went back inside and all told my mother in law about what we all saw.  nobody wants to go outside again. i know that i was shaking like a leaf and i still feel like vomiting an hour later.
content.summary: Craft being pursued by usaf jet

content.detailedDescription: I was out in the country with my girlfreind for some privacy.  the car was not running.  from nowhere an extremely bright white light seemed to hover over the windsheild.  we watched for about 30 seconds.  i then thought that somebody was trying to scare us as a prank with a flashlight.  the only problem was that this light was way too bright to be a flashlight.  i jumped out of the car to see who was doing this.  as soon as i opened the door,  the light vanished.  there was no one there.  we were next to a cornfeild,  about 5 miles from the nearest structure.  once i concluded that there was no one around,  we got out of there in a hurry.  the few people that i have told make fun of me,  so i kept my mouth shut about it.  the girl i was with is now my wife.
content.summary: white light in windsheild

content.detailedDescription: On tuesday june 7, 2005 at 10:35 p.M. at night i was at a nearby neighbors house with some friends out on the patio in the backyard. we were out on the patio in the backyard we were grilling barbecue ribs, barbecue chicken, and steaks on the outdoor grills out in the backyard i looked up above me i saw 3 circle ufos. the first ufo was round and on the inside of the bottom it had red, yellow, and green lights then red, yellow, and purple lights then again red, yellow and green lights and it emitted orange beams. the second ufo was round and on the inside of the bottom it had red and orange lights then it was a roquefort blue (what i mean by a roquefort blue it looked like roquefort and blue cheese salad dressing the lights on the inside of the bottom looked like roquefort salad dressing it had light blue lights) it was a roquefort blue the lights on the inside of the bottom had roquefort blue lights then again red and orange lights mainly red lights. the third ufo was round and on the inside of the bottom it had red, yellow, and pink lights then it was a tamale red. then all 3 ufos streaked away they maybe crashed out in the ocean. it was a clear night there was no sound to these objects.
content.summary: When if got back from the shopping mall i got together with friends

content.detailedDescription: I already stated the larger rectangle aircraft was using a ball shape smaller, about 10 ft. thick, aircraft brightly white lighted, to watch the road farther southeast toward hwy. 115. i had called a friend by cellphone about whether to leave my roadgate unlocked. the persons using the rectangle aircraft were listening for radio in the area, and started the ball aircraft northwest, about 200 ft. up,with a trail of bright white electric fire behind it, and a thin white vapor trail behind that.  the ball aircraft went north of where i was, turned very sharply to the south, and stopped, hovering directly above my car and self. it dimmed down, looking smaller, so to look at it casually, one would think it was a somewhat large planet or star.  i didn't try videotaping or using cellphone. i calmly drove away along marvin rd. a family who rented my farm years ago stated that in the mid-to-late 1970s, several times they had seen lights of an aircraft go down in the woods to the southeast, and not come back up again. they had considered the possibility of dope-hauling aircraft, as some publicity had been started on what later was the iran-contra federal dope-running scandal. my seeing these 2 aircraft may be the first time anyone willing to speak up has done so. the u.S. started flying b-52 bombers on hazardously low practice through the area in 1980. the lack of complaints by area people, as so many have relatives in the armed forces, seems to have made this area desirable, with its isolation, by the persons using the rectangle large aircraft. i think we are facing ordinary sinful humans using tesla-type radio field-to-negative-static-electric-field multipurpose aircraft, able to act as a submarine-boat or aircraft or spacecraft. a tuning selection allows the aircraft to fly invisibly, with fraction-of-a-second repeated becoming visible to keep watch, but too fast for a casual watcher on the ground to notice.  that's why still cameras may get photos of these machines, while the photographer may not notice such at the time. it's like looking at an electric fan in motion. usually the blades are a blur.  using a strobe light in synchronization allows a series of flash views, each one showing the fan blades as if still, not in motion.  i am very displeased about this problem, as the radiation from these tesla-aircraft has caused severe mutation-type and direct injury environmental ruin in other parts of this nation; an example is rock creek hollow, west virginia, where various soil fungi and bacteria have mutated and attacked the root systems of forest trees, including black walnut, white oak, and mulberry.  if your members will use degaussing-field protective suits, it prevents tesla-aircraft from causing radio-field temporary knockout, paralysis of arms and legs, or dizziness and a very strong feeling of fear.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Followup on earlier info sent dec. 5, 2005 to you.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just finished jogging in bushy park, in teddington and was drinking some water whilst leaning on the bonnet of my car. my car was facing a large area of open space in the park.  it was a warm night, and there was very little breeze.  

i was just gazing around, when, over the tree tops, this, initially what i thought was a jet, slowly glided over the tree line. i watched for a few seconds, and became curious. so i walked towards the path it was taking.  it was strange, because i seemed to walk a fair distance before it reached the are above me but dont really remember the passing of time that well.

upon apporaching it, i assumed it was a military jet, but the nearer i got, i realised there appeared to be no windows, there were no lights. i stopped as the craft went over head( and bear in mind this is only about 100 - 150 feet above me) and there was a pattern, which i can remember to this day.  it was going so slowly, it may have even hovered, i half expected to feel some wind when underneath it, but nothing. 

there was no noise either and no lights, as the craft moved on, i looked at the back of it, there was nowehere for the fuel to escape from, no vapour trail, nothing, just a black "side" to its rear.  it was just flying with no visible means of staying up.  i can remember feeling cold, as it moved away, again so slowly that i probably could have ran after it. 

it glided over the trees and then out of sight completely. i can remember feeling stunned by it, it wasnt until i got up close that i thought that this might be something out of the norm.

after i returned to my car, which seemed to take a lot longer than when i walked to have a look at the object. i gazed around, and my curiosity was then further aroused as there seemed to be about half a dozen helicopters in the distance all hovering around the area (i would guess the radius was several miles) the choppers werent frantic, but i just remember that there was quite a few of them. 

the only other thing i remember, was, if you think of a shooting star speeding across the night, in the distance i saw a light shoot off into the sky, from more of an earthbound location into the sky and a gradual angle.

i can remember not feeling scared or nervous at all, throughout the whole thing, i just remember being intrigued. upon lookng back, i was probably mad to walk towards it, but i felt no fear, nothing. the temperature drop was strange.

several things confused me, firstly that i was very close to heathrow airport (no more then 10 miles away) i dont remember walking towards the object properly, although i must have done. it seemed to move so slowly and so quietly. the pattern on the underneath wasn't that involved, but not necessary for a craft at all.

after the event, i looked some info up, and found that black triangles were a relatively common occurance, although the one i saw seemed to differ slightly.

it is something that happened that i will never forget, and it is still very clear in my head what happened that summer evening. 

i hope this helps your database.
content.summary: Large black triangle with no lights moving very slowly in park.

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight i had walked into my back yard before retiring and looked at the rising moon, which was approximately 40 degrees above the horizon. to the nne, i could see what i thought was an aircraft headed south at approximately the same relative altitude as the rising moon from my ground perspective. the bright white light which appeared to be the same intensity as a small aircraft's and about the size of a pencil eraser held at arms length, also appeared to have red light in a halo effect around the white light but at a greatly reduced size and barely discernable from the white light.  i estimated the "aircraft" to be approximately ��� mile away from me based on numerous other aircraft sightings over the years of airplanes flying overhead en route to our local airport.

i watched the "aircraft" for approximately (1) minute and realized that it's lateral speed was slowing and it was now turning further west towards my location which could account for the illusion of it slowing down.  although it still had the red halo effect, i realized that it was not an aircraft rotating beacon or navigation light.  i then called to my wife and twenty year old son to come outside and we watched for (1) minute more as the object began to slowly weave left to right and began to drop in altitude. the white light dimmed slightly and then it suddenly dropped what appeared to be (3) red fragments much like flares dropped by jet fighter aircraft.  the object zig-zagged left to right and still continued to drop in altitude headed south.  it emitted (3-4)red fragments and appeared to turn due east.  its size continued to reduce which led me to believe it was moving away from me.  it was also appeared to reduce in size every time it emitted the fragments.  it finally disappeared altogether which left my family and i, awe struck.

i have been a patrol sergeant with a local law enforcement agency for almost twenty years and have observed several missile launches from vandenberg afb which is approximately (200)miles se of me.  the launches leave a visible smoke trail from my town and sometimes i can see the booster separations and engine burns, if the sky is clear.  i have also observed dozens of space junk re-entries, satellites including iridium flares, and orbiting spacecraft, but i have never seen an object perform as this one did tonight.  it went from controlled navigation to weaving like a drunk driver and then straighten itself back out in seconds.  i have seen jet aircraft drop flare counter measures before and they have a systematic ejection, controlled decent and separation.  these fragments did not.  

i have a navel air station approximately (30) miles west of me and fa-18 hornets fly overhead day and night.  they are flying over to the china lake and nellis afb test ranges, so i'm accustomed to the sounds they make, the navigation lights they have and the speeds they transit our airspace at. this object had no sound and from the estimated distance and the fact that it was after 2300 hours, it was quiet.  there was no sound, no explosion, no smoke and unlike anything i had ever experienced before in real life.

we believe it was a ufo.
content.summary: Non-aircraft, white light object dropping or ejecting red colored fragments, while changing course and altitude.

content.detailedDescription: i was on the phone with eywitness. he was in riverside c.A. looking east (away from the moon) at an object moving "gracefully". it was round "almost like a clock but with a luminence in the center brighter in the center and 2 lights at what would be 1:00 and 7:00. the top seemed cut out".   sighting lasted aprox 2 min 50 sec. the object appeared slightly smaller than a full moon and slightly less luminous.   it  moved away tward the east.
content.summary: Round glowing

content.detailedDescription:
It was just after dusk and a fellow college student and i were outside emptying trash into the dumpster behind our apartment building. the building was situated on a hill overlooking the town of dover. we both noticed a bright white light in the sky fairly low on the horizon to the west.  we commented to each other and watched it because it was maneuvering in an unusual zig-zag pattern right to left across the sky.  its motion was rapid and very smooth.  we heard no sound, but at that point it seemed far enough away that we wouldn't have expected to anyway.  

after a few minutes the lights changed color from white to multicolored and began to blink, similar to strands of christmas "chaser" lights. after watching it zig-zag for about 8 minutes the object suddenly came to a dead stop in the center of the sky.  both my friend and i had the sense that instead of us watching it, it had suddenly spotted us and was doing the watching.  it was a very creepy feeling!  after it stopped it began to move very rapidly toward us and it was apparent that it was metallic and saucer-shaped, the classic ufo. the lights surrounded the center and appeared to encircle the circumference of the object. at no time did it make any sound.  it just advanced toward us with incredible speed, lights still blinking.  fear got the better of our curiosity at that point and we both ran back into our building and up to our 3rd floor apartment as fast as we could go.  once inside we ran to our deck to continue watching the object but at that point it had vanished from sight.  

over the next couple of weeks we asked other students if they had seen it but found no other witnesses.  we did, however, hear a local radio news item the very next day about several callers who had phoned the station to report seeing a ufo at approximately the same time we did.
content.summary: Disk-shaped soundless object with multicolored lights in sky at dusk
